version_description:
With this free update you will get new christmassy levels for the Winter World "Snowy Hills".
Also the controls of the game have been improved by adding a function that enables you to move joints of bridges you already built.

Thanks for your re

Also the controls of the game have been improved by adding a function that enables you to move joints of bridges you already built.

Halloween is over
Halloween is over
Santa is coming! That means presents for everyone - and of course Santa's Sleigh!
Santa is coming! That means presents for everyone - and of course Santa's Sleigh!

It´s springtime! With this brand new update you will get three new Easter Island levels (opened every year from 15th March to 15th May). Beside that we did some optical improvements and fixed smaller bugs. We hope you enjoy the update!
